reviews.review: Уже столько кейсов открыл, а нож так и не падает. Даже красное не получал.

我个人是比较喜欢Csgo的游戏体验！就是外挂太多！希望对使用辅助的玩家加大力度封禁效率！
very fun with friends alot of hours  to play with friends

灰常的好玩，尤其适合我这种晚上需要学习但没有台灯的选手，队友很贴心的会扔闪，让孤独的夜晚增添一份光明👍👍
IF YOU WANT TO GET KILL WHILE YOUR CROSSHAIR IS ON THE ENEMY DO NOT BUY THIS GAME.

This is a very good game. When it first appered it was very nice but know is full of cheaters.All u can do now is that when u are playing a competitive match and u are losing u can only calm down and try not to brake your mouse keybord or your monitor.If cheaters are going down this game is going to be beautiful again so until then KEEP YOUR PC AND THE OTHER THING SAFE LOVE U GUYS <3
